sentences.en: After dinner, everyone had a dish of strawberry whip.
sentences.cn: 正餐后, 每人吃一盘草莓鸡蛋奶油甜食.

sentences.en: All the strawberry jellies had been eaten.
Can I have a strawberry - ice?
sentences.cn: 给我一份草莓雪糕行 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is a middle - aged man with a flaming strawberry mark on his left cheek.
sentences.cn: 他中等年纪,左脸颊上有一块象草莓一般的火红色的胎记.

sentences.en: He sent his driver to fetch him a strawberry shake.
sentences.cn: 他让司机去给他买一杯草莓奶昔。
她最喜欢的水果是草莓.

sentences.en: I have bought a jar of strawberry jam.
Strawberry is in season this month.
The wild strawberry is 2 cm long.
Then he drank strawberry juice through a straw.
sentences.cn: 然后他用吸管喝了一些草莓果汁。

sentences.en: They planted out strawberry runners here.
sentences.cn: 他们在这儿种植了草莓的藤蔓.

sentences.en: We have different pies, such as apple, cherry, and strawberry pies.
sentences.cn: 我们有不同的派, 例如苹果 、 樱桃和草莓派.

sentences.en: We have three flavors of ice-cream,vanilla chocolate and strawberry.
sentences.cn: 我们有三种口味的冰欺凌，香草，巧克力和草莓。

sentences.en: We have vanilla, chocolate, and strawberry.
sentences.cn: 我们有香草的 、 巧克力的和草莓的.

sentences.en: You have choice of two flavors of ice cream ---- chocolate and strawberry.
sentences.cn: 你可以选择要巧克力还是草莓口味的冰淇淋.

sentences.en: You might be able to buy papaya or strawberry.
sentences.cn: 你可能会买木瓜和草莓.

trans.tran_en: a soft red juicy fruit with small seeds on its surface, or the plant that grows this fruit
